definition: A process of exchanging the power source of a device, typically involving the removal and replacement of a specific component. This term is commonly used when referring to the act of changing batteries in electronic devices or appliances.

examples.english: I have to perform the battery replacement.
Can you take care of the battery replacement?

examples.german: Der Batteriewechsel dauert nur wenige Minuten.
examples.english: The battery replacement only takes a few minutes.
